remarks: In a transposition of two given points, all other points are mapped to themselves.  (Contributed by AV, 17-Mar-2019.)
statement:
pmtrfval.t $e |- T = ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
pmtrprfv3 $p |- ( ( D e. V /\ ( X e. D /\ Y e. D /\ Z e. D ) /\ ( X =/= Y /\ X =/= Z /\ Y =/= Z ) ) -> ( ( T ` { X , Y } ) ` Z ) = Z ) $.
